summary: Current VIX ~14.5, period includes likely FOMC meeting (Jan 27-28) and Q4 earnings season. Monte Carlo gives median max high ~17.5-19.
content:
Key findings:
- Current VIX: 14.51 (close Jan 2, 2026), high of 15.42 on Jan 2
- VIX has been declining from ~28 in late Nov to ~14.5 currently
- Recent calm 9-day windows (Dec 22-Jan 2): max high 15.42
- More active 9-day windows (Dec 8-19): max high 18.00
- FOMC meeting likely Jan 27-28 (within window) - major catalyst
- Q4 earnings season starts late January - another catalyst
- Jan 19 is MLK Day (market closed), so 9 trading days in window
- Monte Carlo simulation (with jumps, FOMC effects): median ~17.5-19, 90th ~22-26
- Historical VIX max highs over 2-week periods from ~14.5 base: typically 16-20 in calm conditions
